information: Agricola Gil S.L from Aragon Spain is a family company built in 1985 and thanks to passion for agriculture we have grown from a simple manufacturer to a successful and diverse company. Agricola Gil., has a strong financial position and storage volume of more than 50.000 tons of fresh fruits and vegetables. Being producers gives us an opportunity to sell fresh fruit in palox or bins, directly from the field, what gives us competitive prices and transportation of fresh products. We possess diverse machinery like presorting line, sizing machinery, basket loading machinery, bagging machines, strapping machines, flowpack, packing machines and other. Our fruit and vegetables: apple, pear, cherry, melon, wathermelon, nectarine, peach, apricot, plum, kiwi, strawberry, cabbage, pumpkin, kale, brocolli, tomato, red pepper...
